data_table.description: Form 301 - WHI Long Life Study Visits (WHI-LLS)

variable.name: F301DY
variable.description: F301 Days since randomization or enrollment

variable.name: F301VY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this form was collected.

variable.name: EXAMDY
variable.comment: Days since randomization or enrollment to exam date.

variable.name: EXAMTIME
variable.comment: Time the exam was performed in 12 hour time. Format HH12MI. Combine with EXAMAMPM to get time of day.

variable.name: EXAMTIME24
variable.comment: Computed variable: Time the exam was performed in 24 hour time. Format HH24:MI.

variable.name: NOEXAM
variable.value: Examiner not granted access to resident
Participant's residence is a skilled nursing facility
Not safe for RA to enter residence

variable.name: DRAWSUCCESS
variable.comment: Flag indicating that the specimen collection in the exam was successful. Set to missing if EXAMINIT = 0.

variable.name: FASTHRS
variable.comment: Number of hours since had anything to eat or drink besides water before specimen draw.

variable.name: DIABMEDS
variable.comment: Insulin or other diabetes medication taken the morning before the blood draw.

variable.name: NODRAW
variable.comment: Sub-question of F301 V1 Q9 'Specimen draw attempts' (skip pattern rule not applied).
variable.value: Found no acceptable veins for a draw attempt

variable.name: DRAWTIME
variable.comment: Time of final draw attempt in 12 hour time: Format HH12MI. Combine with DRAWAMPM to get time of day.

variable.name: DRAWTIME24
variable.comment: Computed variable: Time of final draw attempt in 24 hour time. Format HH24:MI.

variable.name: GRIPCOMP
variable.value: Test completed on one or both
Attempted, unable to complete on either side
Not attempted for safety or health reasons
Not attempted because dynamometer not available

variable.name: RGRIPSTR1
variable.comment: Right hand grip strength: Measurement #1 (kg).

variable.name: RGRIPSTR2
variable.comment: Right hand grip strength: Measurement #2 (kg).

variable.name: LGRIPSTR1
variable.comment: Left hand grip strength: Measurement #1 (kg).

variable.name: LGRIPSTR2
variable.comment: Left hand grip strength: Measurement #2 (kg).

variable.name: SBSCOMP
variable.comment: Side-by-side balance test completed.

variable.name: SBSTIME
variable.comment:
Side-by-side balance test time (seconds). Test designed as a screen for all following balance tests. Maximum possible time set to 10 seconds.

Sub-question of F301 V1 Q17.1 'Side by side: completion' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: SEMITDMCOMP
variable.comment: Semi-tandem balance test completed. Test designed to be completed only if SBSTIME >= 10.0 seconds.

variable.name: SEMITDMTIME
variable.comment:
Semi-tandem balance test time (seconds). Test designed to be completed only if SBSTIME >= 10.0 seconds. Maximum possible time set to 30 seconds.

Sub-question of F301 V1 Q17.2 'Semi tandem: completion' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: TDMCOMP
variable.comment: Tandem stand balance test completed. Test designed to be completed only if SEMITDMTIME >= 30.0 seconds.

variable.name: TDMTIME1
variable.comment:
Tandem stand balance test time #1 (seconds). Test designed to be completed only if SEMITDMTIME >= 30.0 seconds. Maximum possible time set to 30 seconds.

Sub-question of F301 V1 Q17.3 'Tandem stand: completion' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: TDMTIME2
variable.comment:
Tandem stand balance test time #2 (seconds). Second try allowed if TDMTIME1 < 30.0 seconds. Maximum possible time set to 30 seconds.

Sub-question of F301 V1 Q17.3 'Tandem stand: completion' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: ONELEGCOMP
variable.comment: One leg balance test completion. Test designed to be completed only if one of the TDMTIMEs >= 30.0 seconds.

variable.name: ONELEGTIME1
variable.comment:
One leg balance test time #1 (seconds). Test designed to be completed only if one of the TDMTIMEs >= 30.0 seconds. Maximum possible time set to 30 seconds.

Sub-question of F301 V1 Q17.4 'One leg: completion' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: ONELEGTIME2
variable.comment:
One leg balance test time #2 (seconds). Second try allowed if ONELEGTIME1 < 30.0 seconds. Maximum possible time set to 30 seconds.

Sub-question of F301 V1 Q17.4 'One leg: completion' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: NOBLNCRSN
variable.comment: Item associated with the first balance test not attempted or completed

variable.name: COURSLEN
variable.comment: Course length for timed walk.

variable.name: COURSMEAS
variable.comment: Course measurement method for timed walk.

variable.name: FLRTYP
variable.comment: Floor type for timed walk.

variable.name: TMDWALKCOMP
variable.value: Not attempted for safety or health reasons
Not attempted because insufficient space available
Not attempted because woman does not walk

variable.name: TMDWALKTIME1
variable.comment: Timed walk test time #1 (seconds). Sub-question of F301 V1 Q18.4 'Timed walk: completion' (skip pattern rule not applied for missing values).

variable.name: TMDWALKTIME2
variable.comment: Timed walk test time #2 (seconds). Sub-question of F301 V1 Q18.4 'Timed walk: completion' (skip pattern rule not applied for missing values).

variable.name: TWALERTFLG
variable.comment:
Flag indicating the Timed Walk tests were performed outside of the protocol. Rather than timing one length of the course (out), and then timing another length (back), the time reported is for the round trip (i.e., out and back). Use caution with the TMDWALKTIME1 and TMDWALKTIME2 variables when this flag = 1.

Set to missing if EXAMINIT = 0.

variable.name: ASSTDVC
variable.comment: Assistive device used for timed walk. Usage Notes: Sub-question of F301 V1 Q18.4 'Timed walk: completion' (skip pattern rule not applied for missing values).

variable.name: CHAIRTYP
variable.comment: Chair type for chair stand.

variable.name: SNGCHRSTNDCOMP
variable.value: Participant tried, but unable to complete
Not attempted for safety or health reasons

variable.name: RPTCHRSTNDCOMP
variable.value: Participant tried, but unable to complete
Not attempted for safety or health reasons

variable.name: RPTCHRTIME
variable.comment:
Repeated chair stand: time it took to rise out of a chair 5 times in succession (seconds). Maximum possible time set to 60 seconds.

Usage Notes: Sub-question of F301 V1 Q19.3 'Repeated chair stand: completion' (skip pattern rule not applied for missing values).

variable.name: BMI
variable.comment: If a participant's BMI is greater than 70, BMI is missing.

variable.name: BMIC
variable.comment: Computed from Form 301, height and weight. Reference: Expert Panel on the identification, evaluation, and treatment on overweight in adults (1998). Categorization of BMI into six groups. If a participant's BMI is greater than 70, BMIC is missing.

variable.name: LASPPB
variable.description: Look AHEAD short physical performance battery score
variable.comment: A continuous score (0-3) calculated as the sum of balance, chair stand, and gait speed ratios. See data prep document for details. Variable is set to blank if TWALERTFLG = 1.

variable.name: EPESESPPB
variable.description: EPESE short physical performance battery score
variable.comment: A continuous score (0-12) calculated as the sum of balance, chair stand, and gait speed scores. See data prep document for details. Variable is set to blank if TWALERTFLG = 1.
